c74object.name: nw.cppan~
c74object.digest: Pan mono input across two outputs
c74object.description: Takes a mono audio input and pans it across two output channels using a constant power formula found in Roads 1996, p 460-1. Processing uses an internal table of 1024 samples to reduce CPU load. Panning position can be controlled by a signal or float input.

inlet.digest: Audio signal: mono signal to be panned.

inlet.description: Input should be limited to values between 0. and 1., with hard left equivalent to 0 and hard right equivalent to 1.
